Field.Label: The iMsg sent to Indigo iMsg Computer - use all lowercase for box above Actual sent message can be mixture of both uppercase and lowercase, as is converted to all lowercase before checks. Pays to avoid extra non-number and non-letter characters if can.

If this box is unchecked the trigger will only be run if the EXACT text is received. If this box is checked: the trigger will be run if the text is received within the complete message .Beware if checked and triggering on short words may get false triggers
